{{ja-kanjitab|りょう|しん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|良|sc=Jpan|tr=ryō||good}} + {{m|ja|心|sc=Jpan|tr=shin||heart}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{homophones|lang=ja|両親}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りょうしん}}
# [[conscience]]

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|良心的な}} (''ryōshinteki na''): upright, fair
* {{l|ja|非良心的な}} (''hiryōshinteki na''): unscrupulous, dishonest

====Idioms====
* [[良心の呵責]] (''ryōshin no kashaku''): pangs of conscience
* [[良心が咎める]] (''ryōshin ga togameru''): guilty conscience
